spec_data.Name: perl-Net-IPv6Addr
spec_data.Description:
Net::IPv6Addr checks strings for valid IPv6 addresses, as specified in
RFC1884. You throw possible addresses at it, it either accepts them or throws
an exception.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 12 Oct 2017 04:04:37 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl module to check validity of IPv6 addresses
